name: Fall Guys: PlayStation Plus Autumn Pack
description:
Fall into autumn with these cosy seasonal wears!

Includes:

Pumpkin Spice (Whole Costume)
Autumn Leaves Pack (Upper)
Tawny (Colour)
Infatuated (Pattern)
Bean to Cup (Nameplate)
Espresso (Faceplate)
3000 Kudos

name: Brawlhalla: Bonus Pack 15
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Ball Sparking! Zero: Season Pass
description:
The DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO Season Pass includes 3 DLC Packs for a total of more than 20 playable characters from the Dragon Ball SUPER: SUPER HERO movie and the Dragon Ball DAIMA.

As a Season Pass Bonus, you can summon Shenron to obtain items such as costumes or zeni. Additionally, the Season Pass Bonus also includes 3 days early access to the 3 DLC Packs.

name: Dragon Ball Sparking Zero!: Ultimate Upgrade Pack
description:
The DRAGON BALL: Sparking! ZERO Ultimate Upgrade Pack includes the following items:
• Goku (Super) Costume with Power Pole
• Emote Voice Set
• 2 player card backgrounds
• 1 customization item that increases a character's fighting ability

name: The King of Fighters XV: Omega Rugal
description: Free DLC Character OMEGA RUGAL joins, THE KING OF FIGHTERS XV!

name: Fantastic Annihilation
description:
As the most devout follower of the Cult of the Last Messiah, you've been elevated to the role of the Great Annihilator. Your sacred mission: to annihilate every last trace of life on Earth and return the planet to its original, pure, desolate state—a barren world of rocky landscapes, devoid of sin and life.

But be warned: failure in your mission means your own annihilation

name: Citypurger
description: A kinetic brainwipe for citybound psyches! A soothing and informative walking tour of glitchbuild architectural nullities that also cleans out unwanted mental detritus. Let our patented logobuzz hypnotyping technology wash over your buildingweary brainpan... All while you effortlessly fortify your subconscious for future oneiric scenarios! Repeat wash cycles as many times as needed. No two runthroughs are the same!

name: Joycoin
description: Gory economic simulator and clicker game, inspired by classic cartoons.

name: Dungeons 3: Extremely Evil Edition
description: Dungeons III Extremely Evil Edition Includes: Dungeons III, a unique Throne Room DLC, an original Dungeons Coaster and the Digital Soundtrack!

name: Nunya
description:
You play as Nunya, a nun that lives in town that is on top of a dungeon full of mysteries.
Use the elevators to explore the dungeon and find the treasures hidden inside. But be careful, the dungeon is full of monsters.

name: Catherna's Destiny
description: Embark on a journey through a surreal, postmodern world in our quirky RPG. Navigate a twisted, alternate reality where the laws of physics and reality are constantly in flux. Explore a beautifully rendered, hand-drawn landscape, filled with unexpected surprises and mind-bending vistas. Meet a cast of eccentric and offbeat characters, each with their own story to tell. With a mix of dark humor and a hint of nostalgia, this RPG will take you on a trip you won't soon forget.

name: Planet Graveyard
description: Planet Graveyard is a short existential horror game based on a dream. It takes inspiration from LSD Dream Emulator and was originally created for the LSD Jam 2022. Explore bizarre and seemingly lifeless planet that looks like giant graveyard. Find out what actually happened to this world by interacting with different sights, scattered around. You are free to leave this planet whenever you want.

name: Big Dengi
description: Big Dengi is a wild blend of visual novel and clicker. Originally it was supposed to be a part of Anti-Capitalistic Game Jam. Play as a faceless clerk in one of the worst corporations in the world. It's violent, unsafe, and unhinged. Will you keep your humanity or will you succumb to the merciless capitalistic machine? Unfortunately the question is rhetorical.

name: Survival Tobita vs. Maniac-Man: Halloween Deathmatch Special!!!
description: Survival Tobita vs Maniac-Man: Halloween Deathmatch SPECIAL!!! is a simple dungeon crawler JRPG, where you play as Tobita himself! Explore Maniac-Man's deadly factory, fight psycho-wrestlers and try to survive.

name: Temporal Deadzone
description: Explore a place of dreams, frozen in time. Created for the LSD Jam 2022.

name: Silhoun
description: Enter Silhoun, a town of no one and everywhere all at once. A short horror game with puzzle elements, set in the void.

name: Yet Another Climbing Game
description: Yet Another Climbing Game is a punishing ascent, a twisted tribute to the agony of determination. You guide your climber with a single, clumsy mechanic, grappling upward with imprecise precision. That’s all there is. With persistence, you might find yourself soaring, stumbling, and sometimes hanging by a thread. Great mysteries and perhaps some reward await those daring (or foolish) enough to reach the top.

name: Amarela
description: With precise controls and refined mechanics, Amarela offers an intense and rewarding experience, perfect for those seeking exciting challenges. Find hidden secrets, unravel an engaging narrative through environmental details.

name: Good Boy Simulator
description: Navigate the asylum as a dog, evade deadly maniacs, uncover the cult's dark secrets behind your owner's kidnapping, and preserve your sanity in this hellish nightmare.

name: Beastbound
description: Explore the ever-shifting world of Beastbound where with every new run comes new Beasts to build your team with and new enemies to face.

name: HitTube
description: Top-Down arcade where you're a vlogger — Travel around the world, make streams of how you destroy everything around and play dozens of minigames!

name: Magic and Dragon: 4X Battle
description: Turn-based strategy game in a world filled with magics, demons and dragons! Build, expand, conquer, form alliances and wage wars.

name: Banana Next Gen
description: Banana Next Gen is a fun-filled 2D/3D side-scroller where you control a flying banana trapped in the Banana King's castle. Collect coins, unlock levels, and face the tyrannical Banana King in an epic final showdown. Can you save your family and escape?

name: The Forbidden Flask
description: In a kingdom that has outlawed potion making, an herbalist turned brew-master continues to sell potions on the underground market from the back of their tavern. Serve both ale and potions to customers, but don't get caught selling potions when the guards make their rounds!

name: Last Pickup
description: In "Last Pickup," players navigate a post-apocalyptic world, carrying fuel to keep their vehicle running and jumping over obstacles in dangerous areas. Be careful not to drop items, as doing so will return you to the last save point.

name: Oni's Tale
description: Oni’s Tale is a vibrant 2D anime-style platformer and typing adventure inspired by an ancient Japanese story. Join Oni siblings Gomu and Momo on a journey through a fantastical world filled with puzzles, challenges, and wonder. Test your skills and uncover a magical tale of friendship and discovery!

name: Terror On the Bayou
description: Terror on the Bayou is a 3rd person, exploration horror game where you must navigate your canoe through a hostile bog, alone and afraid. Will you take up the mantle of lighthouse keeper to keep the bayou safe, or will you become prey along the way?

name: Let Me Book
description: Let Me Book is an intense, first-person survival game where your goal is to return the books to their bookshelves and not DIE in the process. You're a late night shift worker at a haunted library. Danger lurks around every bookshelf! Return the books and escape the library!

name: Try 2 Sleep
description: Try 2 Sleep is a casual, local Co-op horror game made for two players. An evil spirit has invaded your house, collaborate with your partner and survive the night terrors!

name: Elissa Ⅰ: Body in the bedroom
description: The mystery novelist MEL Gideon, whose career is facing difficulties, receives a strange letter claiming someone is in trouble and needs her help. Intrigued, she decides to investigate. As she digs deeper, she starts to realize that her past is far more complicated than she ever imagined...

name: Catwifhat
description: Catwifhat is a clicker game where, by clicking on an adorable cat in a hat, you earn even more cats in various styles! Every 3 hours in the game, you receive a unique cat. Join us, have fun, and help us create something amazing!

name: Tchunk
description: A calming open world adventure where you play as a wiener dog to discover who and where you are.

name: Weird Wormholes
description: Weird Wormholes is a casual game about traveling through wormholes to try and get back home. Use your ship to mine planets for resources and process these resources into components to enable your travels.

name: Jump! The Floor Is...
description: Do you remember the excitement of hopping from spot to spot, avoiding the ”Lava”? We’re bringing back those childhood memories with a game inspired by the fun we all had growing up. You can test your reflexes, strategy, and competitive spirit. The goal is simple: be the first to reach the trophy.

name: Eco Ronin
description: Grapple, jetpack, shoot, and slash through procedural worlds. Collect philosophy pages, craft items, and go to space. A precision-platformer and action-roguelike made in Unreal Engine 5.

name: Santa
description: A 1-4 player co-op Christmas horror game. You have 3 days to deliver the presents and save Christmas, or die trying.

name: Cat Lines
description: Cat Lines is a minimalist puzzle game where you help a cute kitten explore every block on the grid. With simple graphics and engaging challenges, it’s perfect for cat lovers and puzzle fans alike!

name: Sugoroku Casino Party
description: Get ready for a thrilling adventure of strategy and luck! Let's play Sugoroku Casino Party!

name: Subvirtual
description: Clear the subgrid of cubes without touching the bombs by sorting out how many connections are safe! Happy puzzling!

name: Christmas Tree Decorator
description: Christmas Tree Decorator is a first-person simulator where you can unwind and decorate a Christmas tree. Whether you’re a casual fan or a dedicated celebrator, enjoy the cozy atmosphere free from pressures or perfectionism as you create your own unique holiday tree and decorations!

name: Super Web Soccer
description: Sin descripción

name: Block Puzzle
description: An interesting block match puzzle game.

name: Asteroids X
description: More addictive version of 《Asteroids》

name: Music of Destiny: Corrupted Dungeons
description: An ancient evil descends, and you will join the Crimson Knights to save the world! In this Roguelite game, assemble a team of knights and monsters, explore dungeons, collect gear, build defenses, and defeat dungeon monsters!

name: Pipo Dream Friend
description: Problems with dreaming? Get Pipo Dream Friend!! Now you can enter your dreams and play with them! Pipo has the ability to make you lucid in the dream world. Released as a ROM for the Game Boy.

name: Ball Race Party
description: Ball Race Party is a game where you race against time or other players with your physical ball. You can play single player or multiplayer.

name: Arobynn: Sword of Adventure
description: [Sword Art Online]-Like | Welcome to the adventurer's guild! Fight, explore, and grow stronger in this VR world (keyboard and mouse support coming soon!).

name: Motherland
description: Motherland is an open-world adventure set in the ruins of a massive space colony. Join Ellie, a protagonist who has lost her memory, and her companion Will as they freely explore the abandoned city. With no restrictions, players are free to explore and uncover the mysteries of this vast world.

name: The Misfits
description: The Misfits is a Medieval Fantasy RPG, heavily influenced by narrative, with turn-based combat where the relationships between party members will affect their entire development. Guide The Misfits on their journey in search of purpose.

name: Crazy Tanks
description: Crazy Tanks is a Free to play game where bullets bounce of walls, maps have movable crates, and there are Heal and shield Power-Ups in a Free For all Round with up to 10 players to see who is the best one.

name: No Space For All
description: No Space For All is a top-down space shooter where you fight against an enemy fleet to claim your place in space. Upgrade your craft by collecting parts from destroyed ships and build the powerful Devastator Project. Follow the story through jokes in chat with your operator.

name: High Score
description: High Score is a thrilling top-down arena shooter where you face off against relentless waves of numerical enemies. Rack up points and earn medals to unlock a variety of unique classes and powerful items. Dive into the action, enhance your arsenal, and aim for the highest score!

name: New Moons
description: New Moons is a free-to-play third-person and first-person action shooter powered by Unreal Engine 5. Master legendary characters, explore a rich campaign, and dominate modes like Battle Royale, Tactical 5v5, MOBA and many more. Wishlist now for Closed Beta access and exclusive rewards!

name: The Rangers in the South
description: Purge the lands in this 2.5D HD-2D Pixelart RogueLike ARPG! Create hundreds of characters with unique strategies and abilities, face hordes of enemies, explore different biomes, procedurally generated dungeons, and obtain unique items!

name: Katanaut
description: Descend into cosmic madness aboard a collapsing space station in Katanaut, a fast-paced action-roguelite. Unleash powerful abilities, master fluid combat, and confront eldritch horrors as reality unravels around you. Survive relentless battles and fight for your very existence.

name: Lily's World XD
description: Lily’s World XD is a psychological horror game where you investigate a young girl’s computer. Channel your inner 2000s teen as you read her old conversations, customize her blog, and look through her embarrassing selfies. That is, until you find messages addressed to you...

name: Caramel Performance
description: Caramel Performance - Game about circus, magic and personal troubles of the girl Evelyn Vozui. Where will the fate take her? Only you decide!

name: Wizards in Shorts
description: Wizards in Shorts is a fast-paced online arena shooter. Blast your friends with fireballs, electricity, puffer fish, and mysterious blue orbs.

name: Drunk Alien
description: Help this drunk alien find his way back to his spaceship in this challenging adventure!

name: Broken Time
description: Broken Time - a world where time no longer matters. This low-polygon action game immerses players in a post-apocalyptic environment where every movement changes the course of events. Fight and gather resources to survive in this madness.

name: Heartsworn Abyss
description: Heartsworn Abyss is a survival-thriller taking place in a modern dystopian world. Can Rei, a broken man whose life is on the mend, hope to oppose the sinister machinations of Saitou Corporation? Or will he and Akari be swallowed by Miyogawa’s darkness, to be strung along like broken puppets?

name: Superno
description: A character based movement shooter

name: Panzer Planet
description: Fast-paced, twin sticker, top-down arena shooter with roguelite elements, where you pilot a powerful tank on spherical mini planets to fight hordes of zombies and monsters. Collect your bounty for killing your enemies to get new weapons and powerups to improve your skills.

name: Spase Defense
description: Stranded on a far flung planet, hold out for rescue against alien foes with a variety of guns, lasers, and explosives.

name: Bulletproof Tank Adventure
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, engage in a thrilling 3D tank battle game, fighting zombies and AI robots. Navigate challenging terrains with your tank and defeat enemies using powerful weapons. A struggle for strategy, danger, and survival awaits you!

name: Nurse Panic!
description: You play as a Magical Nurse in her first spectacular day working at Rorsh Hospital! Inspired by retro platformers and made for the Magical Girl Game Jam #5.

name: Slime in a Trench Coat: A Cooking Mystery
description: Slime in a Trench Coat: A Cooking Mystery is a narrative-driven 2D mystery sidescroller set in a fantasy world filled with action, cooking, and intrigue. Solve puzzles, fight monsters, and unlock new recipes as you follow Jin and Jel on their journey to uncover the mystery of Juniper’s disappearance

name: Pair a Dice
description: Pair A Dice is a Co-Op Dice Roller where you harness the power of magic dice to create enemies, craft items, and defeat bosses!

name: Nexus M4
description: Nexus M4 is an oriental fantasy MMORPG featuring stunning graphics and dynamic combat. Explore a vast open world filled with adventures, face challenging enemies, gather valuable resources, and level up your character. Join clans, engage in epic wars, and claim your place in this unique universe.

name: Valet Simulator
description: Run your own valet company. Start as a beginner and rise to become the best in town. Park cars with precision, deliver exceptional customer service, and expand your business. Compete with rival valet services and dominate valet market with your top-tier valet skills.

name: Little Slippey
description: Dodge tons of missiles flying at you. Practice your reactions, memorize the structure of the maps and adapt to the ever-changing rules on them. What is the ultimate goal? Pure fun, of course :)

name: Alex and the Aliens
description: In ALEX AND THE ALIENS: Collapse of Time, you play as Alex, a survivor in a world ravaged by an alien invasion. Navigate a devastated Earth, battle deadly enemies, and make critical choices that will determine the fate of humanity. Can you stop the collapse, or will you risk rewriting the future?

name: Nothing Beyond This Point
description: In the Void, everyone is alone, and you're no exception. Use your health as damage, create your own character with abilities and Sigils, and fight through corrupted souls in this top-down action Metroidvania. Don't be fooled - you're nobody's last hope.

name: Trashworld Chaos
description: Imagine a world completely overrun by trash! This is no ordinary apocalypse – this is a filthy, repulsive world dominated by grotesque garbage creatures, evolved from the very trash heaps they once hid in. Their goal? To devour what’s left of humanity.

name: Orpheus' Revenge
description: Get ready to put your mouse to use and get smack talked by a bunch of pixels! Orpheus' Revenge is an 80s inspired arcade shooter with more sass than sense. Pixel graphics, neon colours and electronic beats meet greek mythology.

name: Gravenfall: Veil of Darkness
description: Gravenfall: Veil of Darkness combines turn-based combat with puzzle-solving in a story-driven adventure. Battle cursed creatures, uncover relics, and unravel the tragic tale of love, betrayal, and dark magic at the core of Gravenfall’s curse.

name: Vault
description: Uncover the story of a mysterious island through the lens of a primitive drone as you search for the artifact concealed within it, and avoid the guardian of the island.

name: Become The Devil
description: Two college students travel to a remote area to interview the owner of a resort. Along the way, locals warn them to stay away from the people at the resort. Since the new owner moved in, strange incidents have frequently occurred. The locals suspect something terrifying must be lurking in the resort

name: Shattered Sun
description: Shattered Sun is a fast-paced roguelike where you pilot a powerful mech to escape a doomed star system by battling through hostile planets, upgrading your gear, and racing against time before the sun explodes.

name: Hyper Tunnel
description: A roguelike action game, fly and fight in first person with 6 degrees of freedom!

name: Comet Rogue
description: Fast-paced mining roguelike where you mine and explore procedurally-generated asteroids. Collect dozens of unique upgrades to aid you in your quest for riches! (and freedom...)

name: Typo!
description: Defend your computer's firewall in this fast-paced typing game, battling waves of word-based viruses in Endless or Survival mode, where speed and accuracy are your only weapons against defeat.

name: Astronaut Adventure
description: The Astronaut's Adventures in the Vast Universe

name: They Follow You
description: Use a ship to explore and a hive-mind to take out enemies. A post-apocalyptic, adventure horror game, you must explore a ruined earth with your ship (equipped with a beam and light) and find lairs to take out simplified humans known as Simples.

name: Rough Rivals
description: Experience the perfect blend of American football and bar brawling. Be brutal and cunning, customize your team, upgrade your players, and dominate the field! Challenge your friends in split-screen to relive the joy of couch gaming. May the fiercest one win!

name: Willie's Nightfall
description: Willie's Nightfall is a first-person horror game. Explore the eerie offices of Willie's Company in search of secret documents. But you're not alone. The sinister company mascot, Willie—a distorted, murderous mouse—is hunting you down.

name: Hellstrom: Reign
description: Hellstorm: Reign is a story-driven first-person shooter game where you play as an advanced soldier from Itopia. In the game, you infiltrate the dystopian wasteland and complete missions assigned to you, all while uncovering the hidden secrets of Itopia.

name: Venator Universe
description: Venator Universe is a sci-fi RPG survival game developed by VenatorGames. It aims to create a highly action-packed and hostile environment. The goal of the game is to survive, which requires players to gather resources, craft items, and improve themselves.

name: Kings of Emperor Bonaparte
description: A persistent online wargame set in Napoleonic Europe. Command infantry, cavalry, and artillery to achieve victory.

name: Critter Gang
description: Squeak! Chitter! Chatter! You’ll send these mafia members to heaven on a silver platter! You play as a red squirrel trained in the martial arts of crankin’ out kunais and shwingin’ shurikens! You’ll teach three very important lessons to three unlearned delinquents!

name: Only Up: Lizards Must Fall
description: Only Up: Lizards Must Fall is an incredible multiplayer parkour game where precision and speed are important. Jump and climb over various obstacles. Defeat the cursed Lizards. The slightest mistake can result in falling to the starting location and your Rus brothers will stop respecting you.

name: CZO Online
description: Combat Zone Operation - This is a dynamic tactical multiplayer first-person shooter.

name: Heritage
description: HERITAGE is a psychological horror game where you dive into the dark secrets of a forgotten mansion. Explore shadowy rooms, solve puzzles, and uncover the hidden truth behind a family tragedy, all within a tense and eerie atmosphere.

name: Crab Game 2
description: Crab Game 2 is a multiplayer PvP game with up to 30 players where you have to survive different mini games to be the last one standing.

name: Gretel: The Lost Tale
description: In a world devastated by hunger, siblings Gretel and Hansel are forced to survive. Join Gretel in an alternative take on the classic Grimm brothers’ tale. Hide from adults and find the way home—but beware, trust no one.

name: Cradle of Nightmares: Chapter 1
description: You play as Faust, an agent of the secret organization Nostra Edemas. Using time-travel technology, your mission is to bring justice to the most heinous killers of the past—both the infamous and those whose crimes remain untold by history. 18+

name: Car Wash
description: Car Wash is a cozy experience where you transform dirty, old cars into gleaming masterpieces. Enjoy the relaxing process of scrubbing, polishing, and adding the perfect finishing touch with the power of fresh soap and a hint of clean perfume!

name: Fateful Destiny
description: Can you uncover the truth, or will the mystery remain buried? Explore a village, make final choices, and shape a story you can never undo.

name: Children's Garden
description: Welcome to a puzzle game where your goal is to guide young souls to peace. Set in Sai no Kawara, a hell for children, you’ll stack the divine toy "Gift" bestowed by the gods. Discover their memories and the stories they left behind.

name: Pirate Escape
description: Pirate Escape is a top-down arena shooter roguelite where you are the captain of you own pirate ship as you raid merchant ships and fight against the navy. Choose from a variety of crew members and items to create unique builds and survive until you reach Tortuga.

name: Cell Command
description: TURN-BASED TACTICS meets SNAKE: A new roguelike in the Genome Guardian universe. SPLICE DNA to create new units, enhance their genetics, and take on the Abyss virus once more in a variety of different modes & match types.

name: Cold Sweat
description: Cold Sweat is a first-person single player extraction shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Choose between a casual or hardcore experience as you complete missions for traders, collect loot, customize your firearms, and shoot your way through other survivors and the undead.

name: The Essence of Luna
description: When an unsuspecting person named Saruky learns about the terrible events that could take place in the future, He makes it his mission to try and stop it from happening.

name: Simulator: Parking Lot
description: Manage your own parking lot. Administer, improve, and expand your establishment. New services and features are coming soon.

name: Classic Solitaire
description: Play the classic card game of Solitaire! Experience the fun and strategy of sequencing the cards from a randomly ordered deck. Play casually at your leisure or beat your best time by going through the stock pile the fewest possible times.

name: Cursed New Year
description: Cursed New Year is a first-person psychological horror. You are a children's animator who has come to another challenge on the eve of the holiday, but something goes wrong...

name: Only Arrows
description: You are a block. You move with arrow keys. Aspiration languishes in the factures of psyche.

name: UniqKiller: Urban Shooter
description: UniqKiller is an intense F2P topdown third-person shooter, PvP, with automatic shooting. Combine different types of bodies, classes, skills, weapons, skins, to create unique heroes (UNIQS), both in appearance and gameplay, for battles in urban environments.

name: Unprotected
description: A perverted scientist wants to immortalize the human race and reduce the total human population. While trying to uncover this secret in the game, force the scientist to correct his mistakes!

name: Fluff'n'Roll
description: Navigate tricky terrain, dodge obstacles, and roll your way to victory in Fluff’n’Roll! Master your skills to conquer increasingly challenging levels.

name: Weaveborn Heroes
description: Survive relentless waves and take on powerful bosses every 5 levels! Weaveborn Heroes is a roguelike arena game where each victory brings you closer to becoming unstoppable. Level up, choose from unique spells and passive abilities, and build your hero to beat the final boss!

name: Scary Stories
description: A spooky text-based, choose-your-own-adventure style game that tells several spine-chilling tales with several choices and items throughout, these may change your path... Can you uncover the truth?

name: Ortunia Mysteries: Where Did Everybody Go?
description: A first person escape room game. Welcome to Ortunia! Your friend needs your help! Navigate through an inn, some catacombs, a cathedral and more, while solving puzzles and finding secrets. Discover what is chasing your friend and his companions and why they are being chased.

name: Run the Rings
description: A PvP spaceship management auto battler! Build a custom spaceship layout and compete against other players. Play your way and be a bounty hunter, space pirate, or merchant trader.

name: Ways
description: A lone urbex in an abandoned hotel - what could go wrong? Explore the surroundings and find the mysteries of this place. Don't forget to be quiet - urbex is an illegal adventure, and you don't want to be found...

name: FlurryHurry!
description: Survive as long as possible in this DSi-ware-inspired arcade game. Every zone is pseudo-randomly generated, making each run feel unique!

name: Lost Verses
description: Lost Verses is a first-person psychological horror game where you face supernatural forces and inner fears, using faith and your mother's teachings as defense. Survive the spiritual battles, PRAY! Resist the enemy, and it will flee from you.

name: ConsTance
description: ConsTance is a puzzle game where you have to solve different puzzles in order to discover the secret of the game.

name: Shape Shifter
description: Create, discover and share levels, compete for the best times and discover hidden secrets. In this sandbox platformer, whether you're a triangle, circle or square dictates how you solve puzzles and clear levels! each shape has their own unique abilities that completely change the game.

name: Demon Alive
description: Enter the ancient forest ruled by cursed demons. Your mission: Find the hidden chalices. But beware – the demons use these chalices to teleport you to eerie, dangerous places!

name: Church of Shadows
description: In a cursed, abandoned church, you must destroy six demonic spell books to weaken the evil & vengeful witch sealed away for centuries. Evade her twisted creations, burn the books, and survive her deadly traps before she claims your soul. Will you escape, or be bound forever?

name: Extreme Overtake
description: ExtremeOvertake,try to overtake all races.

name: Shard Squad
description: In Shard Squad, join elemental creatures to save their lands in intense battles against challenging hordes and bosses. Strengthen yourself with unique allies, gather valuable items, face epic calamities, and unlock new members to create unique strategies on your path to victory!

name: Fatal Delivery
description: A short horror game about a delivery driver in a semi-apocalyptic world tasked with the delivery of a strange package to a nearby city.

name: Night Drive
description: Welcome to "Night Drive," a driving simulator that challenges you to navigate a seemingly endless night in search of anomalies to break a mysterious loop.

name: Don't Drop The Cake
description: Let's deliver a cake to our customer. To reach them, you must traverse a space filled with monstrous creatures. If fear makes you tremble or you drop the cake in panic, you'll face the customer's wrath. This challenge isn't for cowards. Only the brave and composed will succeed. Are you up for it?

name: Nomad Idle
description: Face waves of enemies automatically and create builds by distributing stat points, leveling up equipment, choosing passive skills, summons, on-hit effects, and more. An idle game about killing hordes of enemies, becoming stronger, and exploring an unfolding storyline. A spin-off of Nomad Survival.

name: Teddy Roller 1
description: Join Teddy on his sprawling adventure as he navigates treacherous paths and impossible hurdles. Traverse over 50 unique levels, that are sure to test even the most experienced player`s determination. Strange creatures pop up on the way, that seek to deter his plight in this retro-inspired game.

name: The Vomit
description: Sin descripción

name: Light of Motiram
description: Light of Motiram is an open-world survival game where you explore a world overrun by colossal machines, explore the vast open world, build your base of operations, advance technology, train Mechanimals, and take on formidable bosses. Starting from the primitive age, forge a new path of development. Defy the machination, survive with mechanimals.

name: La Odisea del Fracaso III
description: Sin descripción

name: Lab Rat Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Lacerta
description: Sin descripción

name: Shiren the Wanderer: The Mystery Dungeon of Serpentcoil Island - Plus Pack
description: Ten new dungeons will be added to the adventures of Shiren and his companions on Serpentcoil Island. In addition, you can play Sacred Tree as Shiren's partner Koppa and the swordswoman Asuka!

name: World Ultimate Mafia
description: Mafia Browser Game

name: Isekaing: From Zero to Zero
description: Zoe is hit by the Truck-kun, and respawns in a pixel-art game, where she must face dangers in form of clichés, meaningless choices, a plot that has more holes than Swiss cheese, and other plagues of modern gaming. Also, every notable person is trying to sing her a song! Will she endure such torment?

name: Case
description: Expand by producing and defending through tiles against other players, conquer your enemies. Use the various cards you find, each with different mechanics, on your enemies or allies, and become the victor of the battle. The battlefield awaits you.

name: Ladies of Sorrow: Night One
description: Sin descripción

name: Spacesona
description:
The universe is ending, where will you go now?

Journey to the edge of the universe to escape the end, find meaning of life, and find friends! Or, maybe die.

Spacesona is a short visual-novel type adventure game, about making good choices in the moment, and about having good luck!

name: Lamb to the Slaughter
description: Sin descripción

name: Portal done Half-Life Source
description: Portal done Half-Life Source is a mod in which you are required to play through Portal 1's maps with the weaponry, movement and glitches featured in Half-Life Source.

name: The Notzing Project
description: Deep underground, a government science facility lies dormant and abandoned. But when a man wakes up from being held in stasis, he must face whatever technological horrors caused the facility to shut itself off from the surface, and make it out alive. In this first person exploration game, you will find audio cassettes left by the scientists who once operated the establishment. Use the clues you can find to get out alive.

name: Solborne Gorge
description: Bathed in the presence of a dark, uncaring sun, the pumpkin-populated abattoir of Solbone Gorge struggles to release itself from diseased misery. This features very simple mechanics, and belongs to the "walking simulator" style of game. Only mouse-look and simple movement controls are required.

name: What Girls Do in the Dark
description: This little game is based off one of the greatest fears I had as a teenage girl: showing up late to a stranger's slumber party. The rest of it is just extra. A short, text-based horror game.

name: Wibi!Data
description: Do you have what it takes to stop the AI from killing you before you can fix it?

name: Fist 2 Face
description: Battle an evil grocery store clerk who won't stop overcharging you for your food. Keep an eye on the items as he scans them... Punch him if he tries to rip you off! Fist 2 Face will test your observation and reflex skills as the game progressively gets harder! Do you have what it takes?

name: The Maker of Masks
description: A short horror story for the PS1 Horror Jam.

name: Factum Solus
description: Factum Solus is a story driven episodic Portal mod. Player plays as Chell from the original Portal, but in a totally new exciting universe where the Aperture center is not controlled by GLaDOS but a AI called Ben.

name: Unnamed Hero in the Underworld
description: Unnamed Hero in the Underworld is a 3D horror game with EGA graphics. Hades, the god of the dead and the king of the underworld, is going mad. Monsters rise from the grave. The dark forces of the underworld are everywhere... Unnamed hero, please, save Greece!

name: The Disciples of the Full Moon
description: The Disciples of the Full Moon is a retro survival horror made for the Reload Magazine Game Jam #1.

name: Hypnosis Microphone: Dream Rap Battle
description: A turn-based JRPG based on an alternative Hypnosis Mic universe with its own story centered around virtual reality. Released for iOS and Android in Japan.

name: The Alliance Alive HD Remastered: Awakening Edition
description: Physical version with Nine "Night Ravens" Cutout paper dolls

name: Tape of the Ghouls
description: Tape of the ghouls is a VHS found footage survival horror. The game was made in 16 days. This video tape was found in May 2002 in the state of Pennsylvania. This tape reveals the event that unfolded in condemned hostel that was demolished in 1984. The content is beyond explanation and may shock the audience. The recording was code-named Tape of the ghouls. Get ready to watch.

name: Tape of the Ghouls 2
description: Are you ready for the sequel? Tape of the ghouls 2 is a VHS found footage survival horror. This video tape was found in May 1999 in the state of Louisiana. This tape reveals the events that unfolded in the decrepit hotel Starlight. The Starlight was demolished in October 1978. The content is beyond explanation. The recording was code-named Tape of the ghouls 2. Whoever you are. Whatever you know. Nothing in your experience could ever prepare you for of Tape of the ghouls 2. Get ready to watch.

name: Citadel Unchained
description: A 90s inspired open world game. Featuring a rich story and lore. Dual wielding magic. A massive open world encouraging exploration! Numerous villages and settlements. Mountains, forests, lakes and even a sea! Ancient monuments and castles hidden amongst forgotten valleys. Desert Plains stretching as far as the eye can see. Enter a world of ancient feuds and uneasy alliances. Free to explore at your own leisure and you can set off in any direction.

name: Sailor's Grave
description: To make ends meet a late 19th century merchant steamship takes on some deadly cargo. Things take a turn for the worst and she must get to port before she goes under!

name: Las Aventuras de Manolo Kabezabolo
description: Sin descripción

name: Last Rites 1347
description: 1347 - The Black Death ravages Europe. The End of the world draws near as The Pestilence brings about supernatural events. A man seeks comfort and forgiveness in his final hours. This game has some fantasy horror themes as well as some semi fictional religious themes.

name: Virgo Versus the Zodiac: Collector's Edition
description:
This Collector’s Edition includes the physical game, Collector’s Box, 55cm Cloth Map, Holographic Stickers, Digital Soundtrack, Shiny Character Cards and Virgo Golden Pin.
Virgo Versus the Zodiac is a sci-fi/fantasy JRPG inspired by the Mario & Luigi RPG series and the Mother RPG series in which you play as an obsessed villain.

The game features traditional turn-based combat with real-time execution of moves: blocking, countering and timing your attacks carefully as well as predicting your foes' moves is essential to succeed in Virgo’s twisted and unforgiving cosmic quest to bring back the Golden Age, a period of peace, symmetry and balance, or so she thinks.

name: Hellbreak
description: Fight to save your soul from damnation in a brutal arena where only the strongest survive. Entertain the Lords of Hell and earn their favor to unlock new weapons, spells, and blessings. Dive into this fast-paced roguelite arena shooter and achieve the highest score. Can you reclaim your soul?

name: Teleportal
description: Here, armed with a portal gun, you have to explore locations, move from room to room, solve puzzles, go through exciting tests, and also independently find places to open portals that you move in space. The levels will be quite difficult, filled with traps, dangers and challenging logic puzzles.

name: Bane of Oakenshade
description: Enter a dark world filled with mystery and evil. A brooding atmospheric first person dungeon crawler. Featuring multiple spells,weapons and armor. A vast amount of lore to indulge in if desired. Large maps encouraging exploration. 9 areas to explore featuring 10 dark ambient immersive soundtracks. Hours of game-play with rewarding character progression. An unfolding story to discover.

name: Super Mario Ticks of Time
description: Sin descripción

name: Teleportal 2
description: Interesting challenges and 3D graphics. Equipped with a portal gun, you'll explore locations, move from room to room, solve puzzles, complete thrilling challenges, and find places to open portals that help you navigate through space. Levels will be challenging, filled with traps, dangers, and difficult logic puzzles.

name: Below the Oak
description: This game serves as a sequel to Bane of Oakenshade with some recurring themes but a much darker tone. There are no shops so resource management will be important. Prepare to enter the bleakest dungeon you can imagine. A huge map to explore. Build your character up and defeat the final boss. Plenty of lore to indulge in if desired. It's cold, dark, grim and unforgiving.

name: Super Mario's Shroom Shines Escapade
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Endgame
description: Sin descripción

name: Magic Alliance
description: Enter the realms of magic and navigate your way through treacherous obstacles and mazes! As your torchlight fades so does your chances of success. Featuring tracks from our album 'Journey Through the Unlight'. Dark brooding atmospheres await!

name: Super Mario All-Stars++
description: Sin descripción

name: The Adventure Remastered
description: Sin descripción

name: Wintercoffin
description: You are a hunter trapped in a blizzard. Will you make it back to your camp before you freeze to death? Featuring our own music 'A dark wood of sorrow'. Plus many different ambient sounds. Immerse yourself in this unique retro survival game. A vast and bleak open world awaits!

name: Braiser
description: You just woke up in the midst of a blazing furnace at the fire station... Will you be able to stand strong against the burning reality ? FIND AND STOP ALL THE FIRES... A short horror game made for the Haunted PS1 Halloween jam 2022 in around 10 days.

name: Demon Compass
description: Demon Compass is a third person horror adventure game focused on exploration, light puzzle solving and abstract narration. Navigate through three separate story lines, each with distinct characters, environments, and challenges.

name: Faces of the Forest
description: A short horror game by Lunar Finch for the 2022 HPS1 Halloween Jam.

name: Critter Town
description: A short horror story inspired by Animal Crossing for the DS, nostalgia for the 2000s and old creepypasta.

name: Pareicopse
description: Surviving the night in the woods should be easy, as long as you don't wander too far away from camp... Pareicopse is a survival horror experience where you're tasked with finding your camping buddy who has been gone a little too long. Navigate the woods, and stay hidden from things bumping in the night. This game was made for the Haunted PS1 game jam in a little over a month, and released for Halloween.

name: Workshop Maps Pack
description: Map pack consisting of maps removed from the Steam Workshop by the developer.

name: Ticky's Wake Up Call
description: In Ticky's Wake Up Call, you play as Ticky, the walking, talking alarm clock! Ticky has a very important job to do, and it's up to you to make sure he does it on time! Dodge traps and solve dangerous situations all while trying to beat the game as fast as possible!

name: Witch's Heart: Utsukushiki Hana to Akuma no Noroi - Kanketsu-hen
description:
A sequel to 『 Witch's Heart 』and『 Witch's Heart -Bonus Stage-』as one of four endings, by IZ (BLUE STAR Entertainment). This time, it focuses on one of the main protagonists and his conclusion: Wilardo Adler.

It is an adventure game with horror themes made in RPG Maker 2000, story-focused, and contains simple action scenes.

Although published as a separate game, it is part of the main game.

name: Midnight Grove
description: Tecgothica's Midnight Grove is an Apple II style action-adventure game developed by riotjayne using the MonoGame framework.

name: Buggotchi
description: In this game, you need to raise your own Frog, from egg to frog, feed them, watch them grow and play with them in a mini game. The bigger the frog becomes, as hungrier it gets. Try to beat your personal high score.

name: Feed Pete
description: The villages junk food eating plant is sick and needs feeding. Feed it with Junk food and popcorn. before poor Pete crosses the rainbow bridge. But beware. Not everyone wants to see Pete grow!

name: The Legend of Darkness
description: Sin descripción

name: Mario and the Cowboys from Hell
description: Sin descripción

name: Peach In Space!
description: Sin descripción

name: Luigi's Quest: Trouble in Sarasaland
description: Sin descripción

name: The Gentleman's Gold
description: When the sunken treasure beckons from deep below, will you answer the call? Follow the trail to the gold of the Gentleman.

name: Upg
description: upg (pronounced up-gee) is a fast-paced bullet heaven auto-shooter where you focus on movement while your weapons do the shooting. dash through procedurally generated levels, collecting upgrades and taking down waves of enemies.

name: Fiddler's Wood
description: Fiddler's Wood is an atmospheric horror experience about being lost in the woods, it was made in 4 weeks by a solo developer for the Haunted PS1 Jam with a theme of "Folk Horror".

name: Hollow Woods
description: A challenging first person RPG created for #hps1jam. Inspired by games like King's Field and Morrowind.

name: The Coal Room
description: A short, first person puzzle game taking place at your new job working for Business Incorporated International. Learn the ropes of burning coal in this 5 minute narrative adventure.

name: The Golem Maker
description: A short vignette set after The Crystal Golem. Explore a little town and meet its inhabitants. Learn and build something together.

name: Whole
description: w(H)ole - An interpretation of “Mel’s Hole”. Modern folk myth by Death Orgone. Made for the HPS1 Halloween Jam 2020

name: Backyard Soccer '98
description: Return to the soccer field with your favorite Backyard athletes! The original Backyard Soccer 1998 is back and now enhanced to run on Steam. Build your roster from among the iconic Backyard Kids. Kick, pass, and score in this classic game that made soccer fun for everyone!

name: MegaMu
description: MEGAMU aims to offer the best gaming experience, capable of avoiding repetitive tasks while maintaining challenges and objectives even for advanced players. The server has settings that adapt to the player's progress and also provide goals to be achieved.

name: Acephalic
description: This interactive experience is a companion piece to the album "Conspiration" (Conspiracy) by Un Regard Froid. The music and lyrics were inspired by the literary work of Thomas Ligotti. Acephalic further explores the themes of nihilism, cosmic indifference and social construct of productivity through the prism of the anti-Vitruvian man, the acephalic man.

name: 3 Foot Ninja II
description: A second part to the popular 3 Foot Ninja game but with a storyline.

name: The Chain to Bind You to Earth
description: You get a call from your Grandma to go visit your uncle in a forgotten town. Chop wood, wash socks, and enter the cosmic void. Created in 30 days for the Haunted PS1 2020 Halloween Jam with a Folk Horror Theme.

name: Dread in Deep Voyage
description: You are a Scuba Machinist, working for the largest Aquatic Theme Park in the world. It is your job to perform maintenance on a long abandoned attraction known as 'Deep Voyage'. Who knows what lurks down there...?

name: Train Simulator: Tokaido-honsen 211-kei
description: An entry in the Train Simulator series of FMV games by Ongakukan, featuring the JR East Tokaido Main Line between Kamonomiya and Totsuka.

name: The Happenings At Bowers End
description: The people of Bowers End have been plagued by a series of targeted kidnappings. It has become a local rumour that the victims had entered the woods and they have not been seen since. Inspired by the folklore of England's Jenny Greenteeth.

name: A Hunt for the Fae Folk
description: While strolling about in the woods you've stumbled into another realm. It's denizens are mischievous and their pranks are plenty. You are tasked with finding 5 hidden Easter Eggs in order to regain your freedom.

name: September 1998
description: Something isn't right in Kitz River. The people are superstitious and they believe the GOATBOY is watching so you best behave.

name: Farm House Night
description:
Short interactive based on "Boba" Folk horror sleep paralysis demon from Bengal.
You're a worker on a farm, helping your boss and tasks.

name: 9 Ball Quick Fire Pool
description: Sin descripción

name: Bodycam Zombie Shooter
description: Bodycam Zombie Shooter is a first-person shooter set in during the zombie apocalypse.

name: Train Simulator: Tohoku-honsen 211-kei
description: An entry in the Train Simulator series of FMV games by Ongakukan, featuring the JR East Tohoku Main Line between Toro and Mamada.

name: Stellar Verse Pro Runner
description:
Stellar Verse Runner is an infinite runner style game featuring the VTubers from the EN VTuber company, Stellar Verse Productions.

Players unlock the talents by collecting items associated with the talents in the runner mode. Those items can be used in an hatching mode to unlock the talents to use as new characters in the runner mode.

The runner mode has 3 lanes, 3 different heights of obstacles, and accomplishment can be measured be score or distance.

name: Ink.
description: Ink. is a colorful roguelike adventure where every game is a unique journey, different from the previous one.

name: Castlevania
description: A cancelled Castlevania project by Koji Igarashi was announced at E3 2008 by Konami. At the Tokyo Game Show 2008, a short teaser was shown. It was intended to feature Alucard as the main character, and the game was supposed to be in 3D, similar to Lords of Shadow, which came later. There has been no official word on the status of the project since, and Koji Igarashi left the company.

name: Train Simulator: Odakyu Dentetsu Odawara-sen 5000-gata
description: An entry in the Train Simulator series of FMV games by Ongakukan, featuring the Odakyu Electric Railway Odawara Line between Chitose-Funabashi and Sagami-Ono.

name: Train Simulator: Sagami Tetsudou Honsen 9000-kei
description: An entry in the Train Simulator series of FMV games by Ongakukan, featuring the Sagami Railway Main Line between Yokohama and Ebina.

name: Idea Fix
description: Incremental physics based game about pushing levers, clicking buttons and coming to terms with obsession.

name: TCG Card Market Simulator
description: Create a shop that every TCG fan dreams of visiting!

name: Cat Simulator: Neighbor's Nightmare
description: Sin descripción

name: DCS World: MiG-15bis Flaming Cliffs
description: MiG-15bis Flaming Cliffs is an easy-to-learn aircraft module that is based on the full-fidelity DCS: MiG-15bis. A more accessible Flaming Cliffs-style control concept allows new players to quickly jump into the plane and have fun. At the same time, the full-fidelity physics of the original model is preserved, providing the same professional-level flight characteristics and sense of flight.

name: DCS World: Flaming Cliffs 2024
description: Flaming Cliffs (FC) 2024 is the next chapter of the popular Flaming Cliffs series that features an expanded list of aircraft: The F-5E FC, F-86F FC, and MiG-15bis FC. As with all FC aircraft, these additions are easy-to-learn, with less complex controls, and includes their DCS Professional Flight Models. The more accessible FC-style concept allows new and existing players to quickly jump into the action and have fun at an exceptionally advantageous price point.

name: The New Adventures of Zak McKracken
description: Sin descripción

name: One Boss One Fight
description: One Boss One Fight is an Action Roguelike game that center around a single epic battle. Many skills to choose from, multiples phases, complex patterns, challenges and more! Step into the arena and face off against Death!

name: Windows 95 Spiele
description: Windows 95 Spiele is a PC compilation game by ShareBert.

name: Legends of Cobalt Lake & District
description: Legends of Cobalt Lake & District is a short point-and-click horror game where players uncover the mystery surrounding the disappearance of disgraced academic and recluse Amber Gillies. The game itself is pretty simple, but if you run into any problems, don't hesitate to ask questions in the comments!

name: Heroes Lore: Wind of Soltia
description:
The world of heroes to rescue it from the evil. Take part in this epic adventure, full of fights with monsters, searches in mysterious dungeons, the earths of sorcery and monsters.

Swords, axes, boards and magic will be your faithful companions in this game.

Investigate the world of dungeons, cities and the earth, facing hordes of malicious beings. Use all arsenal of swords, axes, boards and the reservation which you can unite with magic and create the new unique weapon. With knowledge of Heroes, the adventure takes a new lath in the world of mobile phones.

Operate the elements and cause powerful trustees to make your adventure easier. Resist your destiny and become the true 'Hero!'

name: Harvester
description: Dig up corpse parts, butcher them, and feed a demon in this deranged survival horror game. Submission for 14th RPG Maker Horror Game Jam.

name: The Helping Hand Paradox
description: "The Helping Hand Paradox" is a short horror-puzzle randomize game that has many ways to solve the main puzzle and 2 endings. It was made for the 48-hours "Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend 1" jam.

name: Integrated
description:
Roxanne is out there to find a job on what seems to be a normal office. However, sooner than later she will find herself in a place she is not supposed to be...

A game made for the Haunted PS1 Summer of Screams Jam by @PhantomaDev and @MiaRevello in 45 days.

name: Heresy
description: In Heresy (or: The Impossible Task of Herman the Recluse), your task is simple. You must produce a tome of sufficient quality before dawn, or you will be sentenced to an arduous death by starvation by way of immurement - you will be walled in alive. Can you make it in time? Or will you need help from the dark beyond?

name: Move Counters That Get More Cursed
description: Move Counters is a puzzle game about moving counters to reach a target score.

name: Bunker 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Beyond Memories: Tale of the Lost Souls
description: Play as a charming Grim Reaper, soaring through colorful skies to free souls and discover 11 heartwarming stories in this peaceful flight adventure.

name: Train Simulator: Nanbu Juukan Tetsudou
description: An entry in the Train Simulator series of FMV games by Ongakukan, featuring the Nanbu Jukan Railway between Shichinohe and Noheji.

name: Train Simulator: Keihin Kyuukou Dentetsu Honsen Kurihamasen 600-gata
description: An entry in the Train Simulator series of FMV games by Ongakukan, featuring the Keikyu Railway between Shinagawa and Misakiguchi.

name: Train Simulator: JR Shikoku 1
description: An entry in the Train Simulator series of FMV games by Ongakukan, featuring two JR Shikoku lines running out of Takamatsu.

name: Train Simulator: Seibu Tetsudou Shinjuku-sen Shin-2000 10000-kei
description: An entry in the Train Simulator series of FMV games by Ongakukan, featuring the Seibu Railway Shinjuku Line between Shinjuku and Hon-Kawagoe.

name: Train Simulator: Nagoya Tetsudou 1
description: An entry in the Train Simulator series of FMV games by Ongakukan, featuring two lines of the Nagoya Railroad.

name: Train Simulator: JR Hokkaido 1
description: An entry in the Train Simulator series of FMV games by Ongakukan, featuring the JR Hokkaido Hakodate Line between Yoichi and Sapporo.

name: Laboratory 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: Castle 3D
description:
Personally gave you the order; in 24 hours you are to get into the Castle at any price and fake Hitler's suicide. You are a colonel of Soviet foreign intelligence and clearly understand that this 'punitive operation' could be your last mission, but you are ready to fulfill your duty to the motherland and the Party without hesitation or delay.

Ominous Castle is guarded by the most experienced and pitiless fighters of SS riot, craving for unleashing their incinerating wrath on anyone who dares to set a foot on their territory. But your impressive arsenal will shed a dense shower of lead on the enemy. You will be armed with the most fatal weapon, which will make your enemies draw back step after another. Fury against will for victory… tyranny against courage… You are to fight with the genetic creation of German scientists – superman and supersoldier.

name: Train Simulator: Minami France
description: An entry in the Train Simulator series of FMV games by Ongakukan, set on the French railway line between Cannes and Menton.

name: Train Simulator: Kintetsu Minami Osaka-sen Yoshino-sen
description: An entry in the Train Simulator series of FMV games by Ongakukan, featuring the Kintetsu Railway between Abenobashi and Yoshino.

name: Battle Gear 4 Tuned
description:
Battle Gear 4 Tuned was an update to Battle Gear 4, and the last game in the Battle Gear series, released by Taito in 2006. Alongside the original Battle Gear 4, the game saw a direction change of trying of more of being a coin-operated Gran Turismo.

Released in November 2006 in Japan as an update for Battle Gear 4; later re-released for export markets in 2010 without support for the NESYS service, but with additional tracks (previously NESYS exclusive content in the original release) enabled. The NESYS online service closed on March 31, 2019.

name: TondaSan
description: Tonda's table clean and grease-free. Your main task is to chop chlebíček (which is a traditional Czech open-faced sandwich). But be careful, don't hit the bomb!

name: Anno: Mutationem - Complete Edition
description:
Anno: Mutationem is an action-adventure game with RPG elements set in a cyberpunk world, featuring a unique mix of pixelated 2D & 3D graphic style with a rich, dark and bizarre plot.

Welcome to the neon-covered, 2D-meets-3D Cyberpunk world of ANNO: Mutationem. In this Action-Adventure game with RPG elements you become Ann: a highly-skilled combat-trained lone wolf on a personal mission in the giant Metropolis, full of sinister mega-corporations, mysterious fringe groups and creatures more bizarre than words can express.

name: The Last Utopi
description: Years ago, after the alien plant spores ravaged the Earth, we piled onto spaceships and left. A new planet. A new culture. A new beginning. But when Eli Mason, the enigmatic founder and CEO of The Colony, asks you to travel back to Earth to find out exactly how the alien invasion began, you have a duty to go. It's time to go back to Utopi, the Swedish furniture store where the spores began to spread. You don't know what's left of your world. You don't know what you might find. But it's calling you.

name: Cod Quest!
description: Run, grow and defend the UK's last Fish and Chip Shop. Your chippy is under threat from an impending invasion; you have 30 days to prepare. Upgrade your shop, unlock better recipes, purchase new equipment and more!

name: Coloring Book for Adults 2
description: Color your way to serenity in Coloring Book for Adults 2! Dive into a sea of vibrant shades, paint your stress away, and leaf through nature-inspired pages. From wild creatures to famous masterpieces, it’s time to make your mark!

name: Hedgebomber Stories: A Shy Guy's Panic
description: Sin descripción

name: Coloring Book for Adults 2: Full Version
description: Unleash your creativity with Coloring Book for Adults 2 - Full Version! Explore 15 captivating categories!

name: Super Terrible Project: Revenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Bowser Jr: A New Beginning
description: Sin descripción

name: Toad vs. Wart
description: Sin descripción

name: TCG Card Shop Empire
description: Sin descripción

name: Bodycam Unrecord Shooter
description: Sin descripción

name: Cazzarion: Fallen Kingdom
description: Sin descripción

name: Kiting Cat
description: Conquer the Underworld, One Bullet at a Time!

name: Coring
description: Coring is a fast-paced, turn-based strategy game with rogue-like elements. Play as Pruner 'III', a reborn entity tasked with severing abnormal branches to protect the World Tree. Piece together memories to uncover the truth of your endless rebirth.

name: Hunters Inc
description: Hunters Inc. is a 1-4 player co-op melee FPS featuring rampaging Orc hunters, gigantic monsters to slay and procedurally generated environments teeming with deadly flora and fauna.

name: 1000 Princes
description: 1000 Princes is a female-oriented 3D visual novel romance game. A fracture in your timeline has caused all your prince husbands—spanning past, present and future from different settings—to time-travel to your current era. Now1,000 princes coexist on your shared timeline, protecting and adoring you.

name: Orcs Will Never Be Slaves
description: "Orcs Will Never Be Slaves" is a rogue-like hack-and-slash game set in a fantasy world. You play as an orc warrior battling in arenas against various enemies to earn honor and clear your ancestors' sins.

name: Slumbering Woods
description: Slumbering Woods is a hand-drawn adventure where you rebuild a forgotten village, grow floating mushroom islands, cultivate plants, and uncover hidden lore in a vibrant, living world.

name: Art Detective: Hidden in Gusu
description: Step into the vibrant world of Qing Dynasty Suzhou with Art Detective’s latest chapter. Discover over 400 hidden objects as you unravel secrets and immerse yourself in a stress-free, artful adventure.

name: Fantasy Sword
description: Fantasy action RPG with swords and magic!

name: Bimfli & His Time Travels: Paris
description: Bimfli and his time travels is an interactive graphic novel about the adventures of Bimfli, a young architect. It includes children's reading texts, dynamic images and ambient music.

name: Georgie-Yolkie
description: Georgie-Yolkie is an all-new purrfect open-world platformer and collectathon! With huge, beautiful worlds, meet an unforgettable cast of silly characters!

name: Headhunters: Bang Bang
description: Modern Gun Fight Strike Games

name: Eggconsole The Scheme PC-8801mkIISR
description: Unleash your Force and take down the Hellstone Cult! A side-scrolling action RPG with captivating BGM.

name: Pool Fever
description: The classic pool experience, right at home!

name: Rage Swarm
description: Step into the swarm and rise as the ultimate survivor!

name: Om Nom: Run 2
description: Ready, set, dash! Join the omtastic Om Nom Run 2 challenge and prove you’re the speedster champion.

name: Sailing the winds
description: An exciting adventure game that combines elements of searching, fishing, and mystery-solving. You play as an adventurer who must help his friend look for his missing father.

name: I am an Air Traffic Controller: Airport Hero - Centrair 20th Anniversary
description: Centrair 20th Anniversary! Tackle the toughest aviation puzzles with the special 'I am an Air Traffic Controller Airport Hero' game, in collaboration with Centrair!

name: Chernobylite: Complete Edition
description: Chernobylite is a non-linerar, science-fiction survival horror RPG. Explore the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone and uncover the truth of your tortured past.

name: Block Jam
description: Plan, match, and clear the board in Block Jam, where every move counts and every block needs the perfect match!

name: Extreme City Delivery: Bike Ride Simulator
description: Who said being a courier is boring? Arrange xtreme city bike races and deliver the order on time!

name: Eggconsole Guardic MSX
description: A shooting game from COMPILE that requires mapping. Explore the maze and destroy the enemy mothership at the deepest level!

name: Rattle Royale
description: 4 Player Madness!

name: Eraser vs. Ruler
description:
Which side will you choose?!
Eraser Army VS Ruler Army
The ultimate desktop showdown is about to begin!

name: Hakkaku Doku
description: Bee's Hexa Hive Adventure

name: Homecoming: Kitaku
description: Uncover the truth hidden in the darkness with your own hands.

name: Cumulative Pack 2
description: Cumulative Pack 2 is a huge expansion mod for the first-person shooter S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chernobyl. It completely overhauls most aspects of the game, and contains vast amounts of new content (hundreds of hours of quests and open-world gameplay, hundreds of new items and characters, dozens of locations). OP-2 has been evolving for over a decade from many other mods such as Narodnaya Solyanka (NS), adapted into a single gigantic mod with several large overlapping storylines

name: Anagrammatic
description: This game challenged players to create as many words as possible from a given set of letters within a time limit. Words had to be at least three letters long, and players couldn't use the same letter more than once unless it appeared multiple times in the given word.

name: So I'm a Spider, So What? Ruler of the Labyrinth
description: I was just an ordinary high school girl, but suddenly I was reincarnated as a spider monster. Armed with only my human knowledge and my overwhelming positivity, I'm forced to use spiderwebs and traps to defeat far stronger monsters just to stay alive in a clicker game...

name: Hitman: Freelancer
description: Hitman: Freelancer is a new rogue-like experience that gives players a persistent and infinitely replayable experience, by configuring and strategically planning for a variety of campaigns, picking a playstyle with all of their gear on the line, and customizing the Safehouse to match their style or mood.

name: Learn to Play Chess with Fritz & Chesster
description: DS Port of "Learn to Play Chess with Fritz & Chesster".

name: Goodbye.Monster
description: goodbye.monster is a text-based adventure game for web browsers. Travel with and care for small creatures while exploring a strange, decaying world until the inevitable end of those creatures' lives.

name: A Day With Mochi
description: In A day with Mochi, you play as Mochi, a young cat who has just arrived on the tropical island of San Felicete. You must help the local cats and fill up your photo album with Polaroids by making mischief. Interact with your world, charm the people (or make them angry), make a mess and escape to the rooftops...

name: Barkane: The Folds of Calamity
description: Take control of Marmalade, a magical Shiba Inu, on her journey to traverse a paper world and collect the gems of ultimate power! In Barkane: the Folds of Calamity, players navigate a series of 3D paper-folding puzzles, where they must manipulate the level itself to progress. Players can fold sections of the level along joints, allowing them to reshape the world, navigate around obstacles, and solve clever challenges. Move Marmalade around the level in order to collect the crystal shards, activate the goal, and progress to the following level.

name: Lime Juice
description: Lime Juice is a charming and relaxing puzzle adventure about reliving your childhood imaginations. Play as a kid and explore a mysterious sketchbook while waiting for your bus, and bring the drawings to life with your imagination to build a series of delightful, animated scenes.

name: The Hunt Begins
description:
In The Hunt Begins, you and up to four friends go to a haunted location to identify and eradicate a ghost. On arrival at the location, the game will select one of the players to control the ghost and protect their haunt.

Hunt the Ghost:
You and up to 3 friends must work together to locate the ghost players chosen haunted area. Use multiple tools to identify the type of ghost and use the correct method to banish them. Be careful though, the ghost does not like trespassers and if enraged will take lives.

Hunt the Hunters:
Your friends have come to purge your existence as you control ghosts that haunt various locations. Prevent them from finding your chosen haunted area and from figuring out how to destroy you. Use your abilities and interact with the maps to frighten your friends and get closer to hunting them down.

name: Lema Sabachthani
description: Sin descripción

name: Mu: Dark Epoch
description: MU: Dark Epoch is a fantasy MMORPG mobile game that combines high quality, fast-paced gameplay, and innovative features. As the best MU Installment in the series by far, it offers impressive dynamic costumes and stunning graphic performance.

name: Deep Horrors of Fishing
description: "Deep Horrors of Fishing" is a fishing game that involves catching monstrous creatures that are lurking beneath. Armed with a fishing rod, bait, and a fragile boat, players must fish up everything in the deep. Players will encounter grotesque fish with their own rarity and items. Will you dare reel these up?

description:

You must move forward and reduce unnecessary government spending to finally take down the central bank and dollarize the country, leading to a stable economy.

Dodge obstacles, destroy ministries, and face the final BOSS.

name: Battlenauts
description: Battlenauts is a 4-way mixed reality space strategy game that thrusts you into the heart of a cosmic struggle. As the commander of Earth's starfleet, you find yourself racing against rival factions to control a newly discovered, mysterious anomaly. This anomaly is the gateway to an entire new solar system and it’s resources, and every decision you make could tip the balance of the galaxy. Prepare for an intense, fast-paced experience that combines strategy, tactical combat, and dynamic multiplayer competition.

name: Gore Crush
description: Crush body parts together in this gory soft physics puzzle game. Create disgusting combos as your smash together like body parts keeping your bloody abattoir from overflowing as you chase ever higher scores.

name: Symptoms of Deceit
description:
You've been working at the Willani Epidemiology Lab as a secretary for around a year now. The researchers appreciate you, but they're not allowed to share the confidential details of their work with you.

Things are going well until your coworkers begin acting strange and you hear rumors of the lab performing unethical experiments. As your coworkers dodge your questions, you meet a new neighbor who seems a little too eager to insert himself into your life.

description: A mod for Crash 4 designed to make completion and general gameplay more fair and more fun. It aims to fix the flaws and weaker elements of the completion system and level designs to make the game into a better version of itself.

You want to buy the land and build a beautiful wellness resort.

You get a new job in your grandparents old town, they left you their house, and you're meeting beautiful women at every turn...Nothing could possibly go wrong...right?

Except, it does. Sudden painful, debilitating headaches and getting stabbed in the chest by a would-be assassin are hardly a "normal" first couple of days on the job. All the while, your necklace which you've had since your childhood, seems to be acting strangely...

Discover who tried to murder you and stop them from hurting anyone else while navigating relationships with beautiful women who are more than meets the eye.

Take control of him and lead him through the ever-changing trail to collect grand wealth while avoiding all sorts of swift and, of course, deadly traps hidden throughout the dungeon. Only those with great skill and luck will make it through.

The game is a simple, single-player, platformer, high-scoring game.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: The Legend of Beowulf
description:
The Legend of Beowulf is a single-player downloadable content addition for Assassin's Creed: Valhalla that was released on 10 November 2020 for Season Pass holders. The content consists of three missions in which Eivor discovers the secrets behind the legendary hero Beowulf.

The Legend of Beowulf memories can be accessed after founding Ravensthorpe, but a Power Level of 20 is recommended.

name: Reunion

It might help you reconnect with people - and things - long forgotten... Play as Tom in this retro-style point-and-click horror game. Explore your old high school. Hang decorations. Learn about the past, think about the future. Uncover the true meaning of... Reunion.

name: Bone Warper
description: This is a wild, weird platformer about bones. It was made for LowRezJam2018. It gets challenging- in a puzzle-y way, not an action-y one. You should be able to figure it out if you keep at it...

name: Mortacrust
description: You are a green ninja who must rake his way to the surface. Mortacrust (You Gotta Rake) was made for 7 Day Broughlike, so it was inspired by some of Michael Brough's puzzle games like Corrypt and Game Title. Also turn-based puzzlers like Full Bore, DROD, and Stephen's Sausage Roll.

name: HLFX: Lost in Black Mesa
description:
A singleplayer mod for Half-Life based on a new version of Half-Life FX Graphics Add-on. It consists of three gameplay levels.

You will visit a laboratory complex and a part of Black Mesa monorail transit system. Similar to the HLFX: Single demo version, you will face doors with keypads and have an opportunity to manually delve into electric wiring, restoring the power for some systems.

Do not forget that Black Mesa complex is way too large, so there are some secret places in the game that are not accessed easily. Upon revealing a secret the game will show how many places like that are on the level, and they are on each level. So keep your eyes open!

It's an interactive story that you control with wasd or arrow keys. There are three different endings to find... This game was created for Wizardjam 6.

description:
Get ready for an electrifying dice game that blends luck and strategy in the neon-lit world of Midnight City.

Whether you're a casual player or a seasoned strategist, Midnight Dice offers endless fun and excitement. Are you bold enough to risk it all for the highest score?
Don't wait—download Midnight Dice now and start your journey to the top!

description: A glitch game inspired by Corrypt and Frog Fractions created for Idle Thumbs Wizard Jam 2015. This is the first game I ever made! The point of the game is figuring out how to play.

name: Dungeon Rummage: Survival
description:
Dungeon Rummage - Survival is a bite-sized, Survival-lite, Turn-based Dungeon crawler with a cozy vibe.

Stranded on a remote island, your only path to escape leads through a dangerous underground dungeon. Dungeon Rummage - Survival is a turn-based dungeon crawler where you gather resources and upgrade your camp to survive.

Explore the depths to collect essential materials. Bring your finds back to camp to enhance your stats, craft potions, and cook meals, all of which are crucial for facing tougher enemies.

Your ultimate goal is to reach the dungeon’s bottom and find your way back home.

name: Night Feed
description:
From the depths of the 1920’s comes this summer’s most petrifying tale! Come and see the story of a man lost in the jagged streets of a cursed city and feel the dread of being preyed by an unknown beast! “There are hidden things that roam the dark corners of this city, I pray for a safe return to my wife. May God have me if not.” Will he come back home to his wife after a high-class feast? Or will he succumb to the darkness that awaits him in the night? Only your blood will know the answer…

Inspired by “The Cabinet of Dr.Caligari” and other silent movies. Our submission for the Haunted PS1 Summers Of Screams Jam.

name: Dungeon Keep

name: Control Freak
description: You are a mutant Ghost that is trying to escape from a laboratory, armed only with the power of possession, you are going to control the bodies of everyone you meet to find the escape!

name: Gandhi III
description:
The city is in danger from a new class of scum, with the streets in chaos and threatened with a nuclear attack the police have their hands tied, now only one man can clean the trash, a one man wrecking crew, the atomic pacifier, in this summer comes the most action packed movie game sequel of the sequel... Gandhi III!

Inspired by Weird Al's skit "Gandhi II" from the movie "UHF". In no way we own the rights to the movie "UHF", this is only a free fan game inspired by a segment in the movie. This game was made for entertainment, parody and pastiche purposes, and is transformative in nature.
