name: Conquistador
description: You came to this new land wanting fortune, now, in this cursed forest, you will have to survive against it's dangers, be them natural or not. Entry for the GameJam "A Game By Its Cover 2020". Inspired by the fictional cartridge "Conquistador" made by Jenn Mima.

name: The TET Offensive
description: You are a Viet Cong during the Tet Offensive, a massive surprise attack that changed the course of the Vietnam War. Your objective is to take the American's Base, you can stealth your way by digging tunnels and avoiding detection, or release all bullets from your AK-47 into the enemy, the way you conquer the Base is your choice, but remember... there are consequences.

name: Beowulf Classic
description: After killing Cain's descendant Grendel, Beowulf embarks on a task to kill the last monster of the land, Grendel's own mother! Embark on an adaption that mixes retro platforming and combat while you explore the old Beowulf Poem.

name: Tomb of the Endless
description:
You are trapped in the Tomb of Unkhdar, and while searching for something lost you will find unworldly artifacts, uncover long forgotten truths and succumb to incomprehensible hidden things. But if you live, may what you find be worth the price.

Inspired by H.P. Lovecraft "The Nameless City" and other books, Tomb of the Endless mixes the gameplay of a retro 2D adventure platformer with a Lovecraftian survival horror story.

Made for "Call of the Jam 2021".

name: Dirty Cop
description:
A new drug hits the city, you partner is murdered and now you are the prime suspect, will you keep yourself clean, or will you go dirty like everyone else? You choose.

A mix between Hotline Miami and a cop thriller. You are a police officer that through his investigation will have moral choices to make, you can either arrest the suspects, or get high* on their supply while you execute them point blank, the choices you make will change the ending and how you play.

name: Super Muscle Mario Bros
description: A standalone game made using sprite assets from early Super Mario games. This game would be like if you crossed Dark Souls with Mario, all of the enemies are powerful and the bosses have phases to their fights.

name: Grim Swarm
description: In 20 seconds the infinite swarm of the undead will arrive and there is nothing you can do about it, so collect all your weapons and take down as many zombies as you can to the grave! See how high of a high score you can get to unlock all weapons and hats Inspired by an old flash game called De-animator, check it out if you can!

name: Posshexor
description:
For a century humanity has fought a bloody war against the evil forces of the Necronomicon Ex Mortis, the Book of the Dead, but now, miraculously, it has been captured and finally the war won...

...Until you read one of its pages and it all went back to hell. Nice one.
Now hexed with powers of possession, you must re-vanquish your path into the begotten depths of hell, cursing your soul with every step taken to once and for all, catch and destroy the Necronomicon Ex Mortis!

name: Deep Dead

The game is a rogue-light slightly inspired by Spelunky where you have to reach the bottom to unlock upgrades, that is if the teeth in the dark will let you escape...

description:

This sprawling tale will take you from the Boston suburbs to Russia, Sicily, Tunisia, and the fictional island nation of Tonalu, where you will cooperate (or compete) with your estranged sister to fulfill your parents' final wishes.

Against the backdrop of a looming lawsuit, a landmark medical breakthrough, and the sudden appearance of a beautiful and quirky investigative reporter with a keen interest in your family, you will make the choices and cultivate the relationships that will determine what kind of man you become...And what kind of woman you want by your side.

Experience an emotional adventure where choices matter, and branching paths lead to at least eight possible unique endings. And don't forget to enjoy the sexy company along the way!

Well, here's more items to play with to spice up the Mario Party 4 experience! Returning, important staples from the Mario Party series that were absent in vanilla Mario Party 4, include Mushrooms, Golden Mushrooms, Skeleton Keys and Plunder Chests! name: Dragon's Lair II: Time Warp
description:
Dragon's Lair II: Time Warp, the followup to Don Bluth's arcade classic Dragon's Lair, can now be enjoyed on your PC. This fully arcade authentic version includes all of the original scenes you've come to enjoy, and even the unreleased Director's Cut ending not seen in the arcades. Other bonuses include a full watch feature to sit back and enjoy Don Bluth's stunning animation.

Princess Daphne has been spirited away to a wrinkle in time by the Evil Wizard Mordroc who plans to force her into marriage. Only you, Dirk the Daring, can save her.

Transported by a bumbling old time machine, you begin the rescue mission. But you must hurry, for once the Casket of Doom has opened, Mordroc will place the Death Ring upon Daphne's finger in marriage and she will be lost forever in the Time Warp!

Bonuses Include:
Full Watch Game
Deleted Scene - Pirate Ship Animatic

The art-obsessed serial killer known only as “the Master” is killing again, and he wants you on the case! To make matters worse, one of the agents has his own doubts about you and your involvement. Who is the Master, and why did he choose you? Bring all of your crime-solving skills – you’re going to need them to answer these questions and more in this compelling Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Beta Hoax
description:
In 1999, Cyan Helkaraxe wanted to stir up more interest in Sonic 1 among the Sonic community. He decided to do something which had never been done at that time: create a ROM hack. The resulting hack would become known as the Sonic 1 Beta Hoax.

Cyan set to work on the Sonic 1 REV00 ROM, researching its internal workings primarily by a trial and error process, since there was absolutely no documentation on Sonic 1 available at the time. His goal was to create a hoax prototype a game that mimicked the behavior of a "genuine" Sonic 1 prototype.

In May 1999, Cyan released his hack to Simon Wai's Sonic 2 Beta page. The ROM was deliberately not listed as a hoax; rather, it was released under the title "Sonic 1 beta?".

The release of the hoax prototype stirred up more interest in Sonic 1, and when it was identified as a hoax, Andy Wolan invited Cyan to the Sonic Stuff Research Group for his work in creating the ROM hack.

Dimension Shift is a puzzle, action, and adventure game in which you are a stick figure drawn from Pictochat. You can use the mouse as a stylus to draw platforms, walls, shields, portals, stairs, and more!
The game is a parody of classic Nintendo games, with thirteen familiar worlds from your favorite series.

name: Eternal Haunt
description: Eternal Haunt is a first-person atmospheric survival horror game. Explore the claustrophobic labyrinth of Yuki-Onna's home. Solve dynamic puzzles, scavenge for items, experience haunting scares that shift and evolve. Can you endure the relentless cold and escape the chilling embrace of death?

name: OpenTaiko
description: Free, open source and customizable Taiko-style rhythm game. It consists of many tracks as well as different difficulties of levels appealing to every single skill level of players.

name: Neon Blood: Limited Edition
description:
Neon Blood is a neo-noir cyberpunk RPG / Graphic Adventure with a striking 2.5D aesthetic, based on the use of PixelArt 2D sprites with 3D modeled environments. Prepare to embark on a thrilling adventure where you will help Axel McCoin, an idealistic detective, start a revolution to change the world. In this video game, developed by ChaoticBrain Studios and published by Meridiem, you will experience a variety of puzzles and classic turn-based combat with precise Quick Time Events.
The physical Limited Edition of Neon Blood for PlayStation 5 and Nintendo Switch includes a metallic textured sleeve, art book, city guide and downloadable soundtrack.

name: Animal Crossing Neighborhood

name: Smells Like A Mushroom: 100% Vegan Edition
description:
Includes super-cool neon effect cover, awesome sticker sheet, stunning boss guide

Features
CHILL OUT AND LAUGH WITH THE MAGIC MUSHROOMS
The fun is provided by hilarious dialogues and a plot filled with symbols of "human" pop culture.

STOP THE MUSHACRE!
Take on the role of the carrot commando to liberate every planet in the solar system.

Use a variety of weapons to defeat different enemies and customise your appearance - will the vegetables succeed?

PLAY ALONE OR BRING A FRIEND
Enjoy the single-player mode with a bizarre storyline or join forces with a friend in split-screen co-op for two players.

EXPLORE SPACE WORLDS
Vast interstellar maps with a beautiful galactic art style accompanied by retro electro music.

name: Balatro: Special Edition
description: Balatro Special Edition Includes 10 physical versions of the in-game cards.

name: 63 Days: The Home Army Edition
description:
A real-time tactics game that takes place during 63 days of the Warsaw Uprising in 1944.
Sneak, plan and fight your way through the captivating main story of brotherhood and bravery against overwhelming odds, solo or in co-op.

The game has been developed by Destructive Creations, a veteran company based in Poland that has been responsible for other successful titles such as Shame Legacy, Hatred, Daymare: 1998 or War Mongrels. The latter was the base game for the development of 63 Days.

Immerse yourself in a fast-paced action and strategy game set in World War II where your tactics and stealth will make the difference.

name: Yoshi's Isle: Sonic Style
description: After two hard years of fast paced running, Yoshi has finally arrived alongside with speedy Sonic. Remember, it's not all about speed though. It's about air! You'll have to clear large gaps to stop Eggman this time around.

name: F.E.A.R.: Complete Pack
description:
This bundle includes the following:

- F.E.A.R.
- F.E.A.R.: Extraction Point
- F.E.A.R.: Perseus Mandate
- F.E.A.R. 2: Project Origin
- F.E.A.R. 2: Reborn (DLC)
- F.E.A.R. 3

name: The Child Of Slendrina
description:
Slendrina is back in a new scary game!

The Child Of Slendrina is the sixth game in Slendrina Series. It gives Slendrina's Child and Slendrina's Father a role as an antagonist. It was released on April 1st, 2016, exclusive for Android devices only.

name: Crispy Chicken Speedmap Session 5: Paint It Doom
description: Brought to you as usual by the good folks at @Clippy's Crispy Chicken Chillzone, it's time for Crispy Chicken Speedmap Session 5! Nineteen maps were made in under 5 hours between November 22 and 24. Enjoy the brief respite before the Christmas season in the best Paint It Doom + Wireframe Texture Pack style. From plenty of doomcute to abstract landscapes, from cozy virtual techbases to all-out slaughtermaps, there's something for everyone.

name: Jump: The David Bowie Interactive CD-ROM
description: Sin descripción

name: Fortnite: Chapter 6 - Season 1: Demon Hunters
description: Traverse a brand new chapter like never before. New weapons to master, mystical energy to control, powerful demons to slay. Become a Ronin in Chapter 6!

name: Kirby: Cosmic Chaos
description: Sin descripción

name: Kirby's Dreamland Collision
description: Worlds Collide! Dark Matter is back and stronger than ever! This time he is packing a new skill that lets him merge realities to gather new support for his anti-Kirby cause! Meet crazy foes, get wild copy abilities, and save dreamland in this unconventional platformer!

name: Kirby's Air Raid
description: Retro Kirby style with all new gameplay. Prepare for an all new, full legnth Kirby adventure like no other! Don't like the cute look fool you, this game will test your speed & reaction to their limit!

name: Dark Witch Music Episode: Rudymical
description: The popular minigame "Rudymical" from Dark Witch Story 2 has been renewed and now can be played on your mobile devices!

name: Seisho 1999
description: Seisho 1999, also known as Bible 1999, is an unreleased RPG game that was in development by Imagineer / Wavejack for the Famicom.

name: World of Jade Dynasty
description: "World of Jade Dynasty" (Zhu Xian World) is a fairy-themed online game developed by Perfect World Games. It was launched for public beta on December 19, 2024. The game is developed using the UE5 engine, using various technologies such as physical rasterization and ray tracing rendering, dynamic shadow options, screen space and true 3D reflection.

name: Kirby: The Dreamland Effect
description: Sin descripción

name: KWRPGIII
description: Sin descripción

name: Winterfest
description: Winterfest is a German educational game aimed to help adults improve their reading, writing and mathematical skills.

name: Mario Noir
description: Sin descripción

name: BubbleBeast DigiDungeon
description: Pop bubbles, fight monsters, and keep rocking to the beat. Get into the flow with unique puzzle-rhythm mechanics across 5 vibrant levels. Match colored bubbles, defuse the Beasts’ attacks, and don't let that combo meter break.

name: MFGGK2
description: Sin descripción

name: Scaling Up
description: Become the owner of a snake ranch! As a small dragon, raise your ranch from the ground up. Gather and manage resources, build various facilities to house your snakes, make sure they are cared for to keep them happy, and collect their beautiful scales, to forge stronger equipment and scale up!

name: Paranormal Snap Shot
description: A psychological horror game set in a Japanese school. Trapped in an endless looping building, can you find your way out by photographing all of the anomalies?

name: Cerulean Tears
description: A vanilla style map map made by FifthElephant and will take 5-10 minutes to complete.

name: Hidden Cursed Crypt
description: The slip gate takes Ranger to what looks to be a guarded crypt in the side of a mountain. He's not keen to find out what is going on and would rather get out of there. Unfortunately, the exit is locked behind a gold key out of reach.

name: Castle Evalon
description: The thought to be abandoned mysterious Castle Evalon has recently been emitting strange lights and sounds. The most concerning being rumbles from deep underground. Ranger steps through the front doors, only to have them shut tight behind him. Donning his trusty boomstick, he has no choice but to push through.

name: Half-Life 2: Alone Mod
description: Half-Life 2 Alone Mod takes place in the usual City 17 that we're used to, but with a twist: everyone, and I mean everyone, is gone. No Combine, no citizens, nothing—just all gone without a trace, leaving a dark and eerie atmosphere. It is also nighttime, Adding to the eerie vibes.

name: Lucas y el Caso del Cuadro Robado
description: Sin descripción

name: Sushi Cat 2
description: Sushi Cat and his wife were shopping in the mall when evil Bacon Dog took their stuff! Start eating as much sushi as you can and try to catch him. Unlock new clothes for Sushi Cat by collecting the Golden Sushi in each stage.

name: After Inc.
description:
Can you rebuild civilization after a zombie apocalypse? From the creator of Plague Inc. comes a unique blend of strategic simulation, survival city builder and 'mini 4X!

Decades after the Necroa Virus ravaged humanity, a few survivors emerge. Build a settlement, explore, scavenge resources and expand as you shape your post-apocalyptic society. The world is green and beautiful but danger lurks in the ruins!

name: Ogora
description: Ogora is a fantasy roguelike deck-builder where you will craft powerful decks, cast unwieldy spells, and blow up your own path through a procedurally generated dungeon. Adorn yourself with hidden trinkets and try to survive!

name: Misfortune
description: "Misfortune is an obscure game for the original Game Boy. Since no known hard copies or roms exist, all information about the game is derived from personal accounts and a scant assemblage of screenshots."

name: Deserter
description: In this stealth RPG, you play as a deserter who is forced to become a thief in a grim, war-torn town. You'll have access to a rich arsenal of tools and devices: from lock picks and crowbars to grappling hooks and dynamite. Additionally, take advantage of your surroundings: find or create alternate routes, stick to the shadows, stay quiet, or use loud noises to cause distraction.

name: Love Letter
description:
"Love letter" is a short, retro inspired, horror game.

You and your classmates went to school at night to break the curse of a ghost girl who is hunting the building.

Run, hide and throw trash cans to survive.
Put the letter together to free her soul.

name: Pencak Silat 1.2
description: Pencak Silat is the original martial art style of Indonesian. The tournament is open with the greatest Pencak Silat warriors all over the world.

name: Pencak Silat 2.1
description: Pencak Silat is the original martial art style of Indonesian. At the dawn of 20th century, chaos and dispute reign across the Archipelago. A person with principle to unite calls for a new adventure in this tropical land.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed - Deluxe Edition
description:
Embark on an pizza-fueled journey with Leonardo, Raphael, Donatello and Michelangelo to battle an all-new wave of havoc-wreaking mutants as you join forces with familiar faces in thrilling missions across the streets of NYC!
The Deluxe Edition features exclusive TMNT themed collectibles that pay homage to your favourite heroes in a half shell, including an awesome Steelbook and a radical artbook which tells the story behind Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed! Beyond the physical game, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants Unleashed – Deluxe Edition includes the following exclusive items: · Steelbook
· 4 Pin Badges resembling the belt buckles of each of the 4 Turtles.
· 4 Keychains resembling the weapons of each of the 4 Turtles.
· Softcover Artbook.
· All contents packaged inside a collectible tuck-in box.

name: Little Nightmares II: Enhanced Edition
description:
- The Enhanced Edition brings 4K graphics, ray-tracing, and more updates that bring the horrors to life
- You'll need to navigate creepy woodlands, a sinister school, and other hauntingly beautiful surroundings
- There's plenty of puzzles to solve, villains to outsmart, and traps to avoid on your way to the tower

name: The Protocol Directive
description:
Dive into the dark world of The Protocol Directive, a unique text-based adventure that blends retro charm with modern suspense. As a nameless protagonist, you begin in an ordinary office, but what seems like a normal day quickly turns into a nightmare full of decisions, secrets, and deadly challenges.

After leaving the office, you suddenly find yourself in a dark room. A light flickers on, illuminating a table with an old keyboard. Shortly after, a PC screen comes to life, and a strange force the possessed Protocol begins testing you. Every decision you make can mean the difference between life and death. Find useful (or deceptive) items, solve tricky dilemmas, and try to escape the game alive.

But nothing is as it seems. The deeper you venture into the world of the Protocol, the more reality and dream begin to blur. Is this just a cruel experiment, or are you trapped in a nightmare? Can you unravel the truth before it’s too late?

Are you ready to face the ultimate test? Choose wisely your fate is in your hands.

name: Elastic Soccer
description: Elastic Soccer is a classic soccer-themed flash game with a twist. In this game, the players cannot move except for the goal keeper. The ball on the hand, gets attracted to the nearest player. Players must then shoot the ball like a rubber band and try to get a good angle for a shot. Take control of the goal keeper by pressing and holding down the Shift Key. The goal of the game is to outscore your opponent before the match is over.

name: Super Monkey Ball: Banana Mania - Launch Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Back 4 Blood: Fort Hope Elite Weapon Skins
description: Sin descripción

name: Back 4 Blood: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The War of the Worlds: Siberia
description:
The year is 1896. The Martian invasion wipes cities and entire civilizations out of existence. Separated from his loved ones, a young student escapes the capital city already conquered by the aliens.
Along with the player, he will have to survive in the distinctive and dangerous Siberia, stand against the forces of the old world, and inevitably confront its new masters.

name: N-Ice Cover
description: N-Ice Cover is a 3D platformer/puzzle game that lets you play as Icy, a cute little ice cube whose goal is to cool down drinks they find there and there. To reach their objective, they'll have to overtake obstacles by placing their unpossessed body as a platform. Will you get your cocktail on this hot summer day?

name: Electro Air Hockey: Under the Mallet
description: Sin descripción

name: Scorched Warfare
description: This is a strategy action game set in a fictional fantasy world. You play as a warmaster, commanding troops in battles. Use the roguelike system to customize your gameplay style: will you be a one-man army, standing against thousands, or a mastermind tactician controlling the battlefield?

name: Electro Air Hockey
description: This browser version of the game has few characters available than its full PC counterpart.

name: Kanji de Go!
description: Kanji de GO! is a free game developed by Micelle, on PC in 2023. Type the reading of the displayed kanji(Chinese character) within the time limit. There are several other modes of entering calculation results and English spelling.

name: After The End
description: In AFTER THE END, you will lead a group of survivors in a world devastated by a zombie apocalypse. Face resource scarcity, such as food and medicine, while dealing with the constant threat of zombie hordes and armed human enemies. Every decision can mean the difference between life and death, and permanent death means every choice has lasting consequences. With multiple playable characters, each with their own skills and stories, you must build and protect your base, manage your resources wisely, and fight to survive in a relentless environment.

name: TinyHoopers
description:
Welcome to TinyHoopers world!

TinyHoopers is an engaging and addictive sandbox-style basketball video game that replicates the experience of playing pickup basketball, capturing the casual social atmosphere of a playground game but including unique game mechanisms.

The game is set in a digital world parallel to ours, where basketball is the major sport! Hoopers spend their time, hooping and leveling up.

name: DCS World: Normandy 2.0
description: DCS: Normandy 2.0 includes large parts of the territory of France and Great Britain, including the capitals of these countries - Paris and London. The map also reproduces in detail the largest cities in this region - English Eastbourne, Brighton, Worthing, Portsmouth and French Caen, Le Havre, Rouen, Amiens and Calais. The coast on both sides of the English Channel, including sea and river ports, has been recreated in detail. The size of the map is 400/600 kilometers.

name: MFGGK
description: Sin descripción

name: KWRPG
description: Kirby Warrior's Role Playing Game was the first fan-made RPG in the online Kirby fandom.
